description: Response schema for graphic design agent with image output capability

result.response: I've completed the task you requested
result.action_taken: Processed the input and generated output
suggestions: You might also want to try X

raw_test_response:
Hello! Could you please clarify what type of sample response you need? For example:

- Do you want a sample graphic design brief (e.g., for a social media post, banner, or promotional material)?
- Are you looking for a sample description of the design process or workflow?
- Would you like a sample image or visual concept for a specific marketing use case?

Please provide a bit more detail about your requirements so I can deliver the most relevant example!
test_error: Response not valid JSON: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

actual_test_response.raw_text:
Your modern, minimalist Instagram banner for SunFlow's Summer Sale has been created!

Design Details:
- Dimensions: 1200x628px (optimized for Instagram)
- Colors: Bright yellow, orange, teal, and white
- Style: Modern, minimalist, with bold geometric shapes (circles, rectangles, triangles)
- Text: “Summer Sale - 50% Off - Shop Now” in a clean, bold sans-serif font
- Logo placeholders: Top left and bottom right
- Visual: No photos, only striking vector-style elements

You can view and download your banner here:
[SunFlow Summer Sale Instagram Banner](https://url-shortner.studio.lyzr.ai/e1fb695e)

Let me know if you need any revisions, text changes, or a different layout!
